theseAreMyContactPages: These are my contact pages, in my github you can see all my projects.
profile: Full Stack JavaScript Developer with more than a year of experience in web application development, specialized in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Experienced in creating responsive frontend interfaces and implementing RESTful APIs on the backend. SQL and NoSQL database management, and familiarity with agile methodologies (SCRUM and JIRA). Chemical engineer with a background in logic and programming, using tools such as Matlab, Simulink and Wolfram.
disruptiveResponsibilities1: •  Frontend development of responsive user interfaces with React.js, Next.js and Vite.js, optimizing the experience on mobile and desktop devices.
disruptiveResponsibilities2: •  Creation and management of RESTful APIs in the backend with Node.js, ensuring efficient communication between frontend and backend.
disruptiveResponsibilities3: •  SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB) database management, designing efficient schemas for backend data management and storage.
disruptiveAchievements1: •  Implementation of an E-learning platform and a backoffice system for internal operations management.
disruptiveAchievements2: •  Development of a multi-tenant architecture for the simultaneous management of multiple clients on a single platform.
disruptiveAchievements3: •  Integración de AWS para almacenamiento de archivos (S3), transcodificación de video (Lambda con MediaConvert) y entrega de contenido vía CloudFront.
disruptiveAchievements4: •  Creation of technical and endpoint documentation using JSDoc and Swagger, as well as implementation of unit tests for the backend.
disruptiveAchievements5: •  Development of advanced data structures, such as binary and hierarchical trees, for user management.
disruptiveAchievements6: •  Implementation of cryptocurrency payment methods by consuming APIs for address creation, payment cancellation, mass payments and cashouts, as well as fiat currency payments using Stripe.
makeRealResponsibilities1: •  Web application development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), applying best programming practices and scalable architectures in both frontend and backend.
makeRealResponsibilities2: •  CI/CD implementation to automate deployments and database management for both SQL and NoSQL using Mongoose and Prisma.
makeRealResponsibilities3: •  Collaboration in multidisciplinary teams under agile methodologies (SCRUM), using tools like JIRA for planning, code review, and feature optimization.
makeRealAchievements1: •  Quick Call: 3-month group project. Development of a website to connect specialized professionals with users. Technologies: React.js, MongoDB, Redux, Express.js, SCRUM, JIRA.
makeRealAchievements2: •  Mi App: 2-week individual project. Creation of a web platform that allows teachers and students to design and manage online tests. Technologies: React.js, Firebase, Firebase Authentication.
makeItRealDescription: Intensive bootcamp focused on web application development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and other tools such as GraphQL, React Native and Docker. The program covers from designing RESTful APIs to creating responsive frontends and database integration, with a focus on best practices, performance and cloud deployment.
misionTICDescription: Program organized by the Colombian Ministry of ICT, designed to train students in programming and web development skills. The course covers from the fundamentals of programming to the complete development of web applications using tools such as Python, Java, HTML, Flask, and GitHub, with a focus on the implementation of agile methodologies and collaborative work.
researchGroup: Research Group: Process design and use of biomass. IDAB.
quickcallDescription: Project in Reactjs (Front) and Nodejs (Back) to expose services of professionals specialized in all types of tasks such as domestic work, electrical, plumbing, mechanics, among others. Clients will be able to connect with an ideal professional according to their needs, through a user-friendly interface.
miappDescription: Project carried out in Firebase (FB authentication, FB Realtime Database) for the creation and management of online courses and exams. This page offers students and teachers tools to be able to take online tests and tests simultaneously.
miappCharacteristics2: Creation and management of online tests
miappCharacteristics3: Creation and management of online courses
miappCharacteristics4: Possibility of managing live or timed tests
miappCharacteristics5: Use of SCRUM tools (Jira) and Figma
makerhubDescription: Project in Vite.js (Front) and Node.js (Back) for the management of job applications for Make It Real students (Bootcamp, medellin, Colombia)
makerhubResponsibilities1: Creation of frontend view (Admin, Admindetails and Home)
makerhubResponsibilities2: Creation of components and sub views (Login, Delete, Create and Update modal)
makerhubResponsibilities3: Implementation of TypeScript (Interface, Type and InitialValue)
makerhubResponsibilities4: Creation of services, applicationlog, application and user
makerhubResponsibilities5: Implementation of Prisma and DB connection (Backend)
makerhubResponsibilities6: Configuration for migration and initial seeding for development mode (faker library)
makerhubResponsibilities7: Creation of endpoint and functions for using Prisma with PostgreSQL connection
makerhubCharacteristics3: Administrator queryParams filters by status, name, email, cohort
makerhubImages2: Maker view: Applications by maker and status
makerhubImages4: Modal for viewing and modifying application
makerhubImages5: Administration view: Maker detail by ID
makerhubImages8: Modal to delete maker or application
archibigeDescription: Project in Angular.js for the creation of a file consulting company page, libraries and documentation center, aimed at providing training and advice.
testenglishDescription: Frontend/backend project made in Nextjs for the generation of a page to evaluate English vocabulary with words from different categories.
testenglishCharacteristics2: Filter words by type and grade made
testenglishImages5: List filter by grades and type of word
megatvDescription: Project in React.js (Front) and Node.js (Back) for page with login and registration and crud of TV series elements
megatvCharacteristics2: Upload of database addresses in client form
graphqlDescription: Backend with graphQl usage for creating and consuming database information in mongoDB
graphqlCharacteristics2: AllUser: total search of users or by Name, LastName, IsMilitar
graphqlCharacteristics3: Mandatory search by userID: UserDocumentByUser, ContactInfoByUser, allUserDocument
graphqlImages5: Query allname, with email of user by return
dreadfulDescription: Project in Angular.js with login and registration page for the management and consumption of third-party API services (Platzi) and filter by product name
dreadfulImages3: Landing page, link for movies and series
dreadfulImages5: Query allname, with email of user by return
crudnextDescription: Frontend/backend project made in Nextjs for creation of CRUD API with fields such as projects, description, price, creation date
crudnextCharacteristics1: API consumption for deleting, creating and modifying
igmDescription: Vue.js (Front) and Laravel (Back) project for page creation with login, registration and notes crud with title, description, label and expiration date field
igmCharacteristics2: Notes crud per logged in user
igmImages2: Notes crud per logged in user
quickbetDescription: Next Js (Front) and Nestjs (Back) project with login and registration for consumption of themoviedb api for management of favorite movies by logged in user
quickbetCharacteristics2: Mark and unmark movies as favorites
laravelappDescription: Laravel (Back) project for user account crud and orders
laravelappCharacteristics1: Crud of user accounts and orders
laravelappCharacteristics2: Cascading deletion of orders by deleted user
laravelappCharacteristics4: Documentation with Swagger and sending notification on node server by socket
nexttasksystemDescription: Application designed to manage internal tasks, facilitating work organization and tracking the progress of assigned tasks. Administrators can assign and manage tasks, while employees can view and update the status of their assigned work.
nexttasksystemCharacteristics5: Password handling with bcrypt and authentication with JWT.
evalartDescription: This project is an API that manages franchises and their branches using MongoDB as the database and Spring Boot as the backend framework. It includes CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for handling franchises and their associated branches.
evalartCharacteristics2: CRUD operations for branches associated with a franchise.
evalartImages2: Endpoint consumption with REST client (branch CRUD).
runaDescription: Application that securely receives and processes cryptocurrency transactions.
runaCharacteristics2: Validations to prevent duplicate transactions and wallet conflicts.
runaCharacteristics3: Docker-based architecture for easier deployment and management.
runaCharacteristics4: Layout built with Vite + React + Tailwind.
runaImages1: Docker container creation and app.js execution (terminal).
runaImages2: Docker container creation and app.js execution (Docker).
pocketDescription: This project is an interactive chat application developed with React, TypeScript, and Socket.IO. It provides chat functionality between users and a bot, integrated with a backend built with Node.js and Express.
pocketCharacteristics1: Chatbot API (AI) consumption for user responses.
pocketCharacteristics2: Handling of internationalization and light/dark themes.
portfolioDescription: Application to showcase portfolio, academic studies, and personal projects. First version.
portfolioImages3: Project detail view, tools, and features.
mgpanelImages3: Dark/light theme, internationalization, and responsive design.
